item.title: 'Obviously, we would have a great team': What Russian NHLers are saying about missing the Olympics
item.description: Russia is suspended from international competition due to the war in Ukraine, sidelining many who'd otherwise be playing.

item.title: Which injuries will have the biggest impact on the Olympic hockey tournament?
item.description: Leo Carlsson, Brayden Point and Seth Jones are among those ailing ahead of Milan Cortina.

item.title: CFP takeaways: Even as a favored Goliath, Indiana's win stands alone in sports history
item.description: Put it next to the Miracle on Ice and NC State-Georgetown. In a wild title game, here's how Indiana beat Miami.

item.title: Indiana fans erase forgettable history with unforgettable title
item.description: Indiana had the most losses, a long Big Ten title drought, no Heismans and no national titles. No more.

item.title: 8-8 in the playoffs with Josh Allen? Buffalo fired Sean McDermott, but there's more blame to go around
item.description: With postseason losses piling up, the Bills fired coach Sean McDermott. But will it change anything? And where did things go wrong?
